resources.string: This is the Main Activity, the user can choose to play local songs on his phone storage or to buy songs from the online store.

in this activity the user can choose the Music files saved in his local mobile storage, when the user click on the song he will move to Music player activity and when he do a long click on the song he will move to Song Information Activity to view each song information.
This is the Information Activity here we can view each song Information
In this activity we play the music already selected from local music activity.
In this Online Store Activity the user can choose a song to buy from the store.

Here we use the google pay Api to complete the user payment, First we need to configure the project then determine readyToPay( ) method then show the google payment Button, finally LoadPaymentData( ). Google check if the user card information is right and if it is right the payment complete and the user can download the song.
